tool_description: We are happy to announce that we are going to provide a new public API for coin and token prices after CoinMarketCap decided to discontinue their public API soon. If you were using the v1 or v2 endpoints until now, you can just switch to our endpoints without changing any other code.
name: Alternative.me Crypto
title: Alternative.me Crypto

api_list.name: Listings
api_list.description: Overview of all available crypto currencies, use the returned id to retrieve more data on a specific crypto currency on the ticker endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://l4chsalter-alternative-me-crypto-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v2/listings/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "l4chsalter-alternative-me-crypto-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://l4chsalter-alternative-me-crypto-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v2/listings/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "l4chsalter-alternative-me-crypto-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: v1 Ticker
api_list.description: Coin and token prices updated every 5 minutes.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of returned results. The default value is 100.

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: Sets the first element to be fetched, all requests are ordered by the Marketcap. That means the order of the returned elements can change over time.

optional_parameters.name: convert
optional_parameters.description: In addition to the USD values the converted values will be deliveredin the requested currency. Possible fiat conversion target values are: ' USD', 'EUR', 'GBP', 'RUB', 'JPY', 'CAD', 'KRW', 'PLN' it is also possible to convert to other cryptocurrencies like: 'BTC', 'ETH', 'XRP', 'LTC' and 'BCH'.

api_list.name: v1 Tickert for specific currency
api_list.description: Coin and token prices updated every 5 minutes.

optional_parameters.name: convert
optional_parameters.description: In addition to the USD values the converted values will be deliveredin the requested currency. Possible fiat conversion target values are: ' USD', 'EUR', 'GBP', 'RUB', 'JPY', 'CAD', 'KRW', 'PLN' it is also possible to convert to other cryptocurrencies like: 'BTC', 'ETH', 'XRP', 'LTC' and 'BCH'.

api_list.name: v1 Global
api_list.description: In addition to the USD values the converted values will be deliveredin the requested currency. Possible fiat conversion target values are: ' USD', 'EUR', 'GBP', 'RUB', 'JPY', 'CAD', 'KRW', 'PLN' it is also possible to convert to other cryptocurrencies like: 'BTC', 'ETH', 'XRP', 'LTC' and 'BCH'.

optional_parameters.name: convert
optional_parameters.description: In addition to the USD values the converted values will be deliveredin the requested currency. Possible fiat conversion target values are: ' USD', 'EUR', 'GBP', 'RUB', 'JPY', 'CAD', 'KRW', 'PLN' it is also possible to convert to other cryptocurrencies like: 'BTC', 'ETH', 'XRP', 'LTC' and 'BCH'.

api_list.name: v2 Ticker
api_list.description: Coin and token prices updated every 5 minutes.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of returned results. The default value is 100, use '0' for all available data.

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: Sets the first element to be fetched, all requests are ordered by the Marketcap. That means the order of the returned elements can change over time.

optional_parameters.name: convert
optional_parameters.description: In addition to the USD values the converted values will be deliveredin the requested currency. Possible fiat conversion target values are: ' USD', 'EUR', 'GBP', 'RUB', 'JPY', 'CAD', 'KRW', 'PLN' it is also possible to convert to other cryptocurrencies like: 'BTC', 'ETH', 'XRP', 'LTC' and 'BCH'.

optional_parameters.name: structure
optional_parameters.description: sets the structure of the data field as either array or name-value pair style. Possible values are 'dictionary' for name-value pair style and 'array' for array style.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: returned results can be sorted by: 'id', 'rank' (means marketcap), 'volume_24h', 'percent_change_24h' default sorting is by rank. In addition it can be sorted by: 'price', 'percent_change_1h', 'percent_change_7d', 'circulating_supply' and 'name'.

api_list.name: v2 Ticker for specific currency
api_list.description: Get ticker data of a specified coin by providing the 'id' or the 'website_slug' of the coin as can be found by calling listings endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://l4chsalter-alternative-me-crypto-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v2/ticker/(id,name)"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "l4chsalter-alternative-me-crypto-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
